Responsibilities.question: How are the responsibilities divided among family members in your household? What tasks do you usually do? Which ones do the others do? Is this system fair, or do you think it should be changed?

Did you ever get in trouble for not fulfilling your household responsibilities as a child? When did it happen? What were you supposed to do? Please tell me about what happened and how you handled it in as much detail as possible.
Please talk about something interesting or special that has happened while doing housework. When did it happen? What sort of housework were you doing? Give me as many details as possible.

Restaurant.question: I would like to know about a restaurant you often visit. What kind of dishes does it serve? What do you like about the restaurant? What does it look like?
Tell me about the most famous dish of your country. What are the main ingredients it it? Do you know how to make it? What is special about the dish?
Have you ever had a special experience at a restaurant? Who were you with? What happened? Tell me about the experience in detail, and explain what made it memorable.

Internet.question: Tell me about a website that you usually visit. What services does this website offer, and what things can you do on it? What got you interested in the website? Explain in detail.
Everyone uses the Internet these days. Where and when do you use it? What do you mainly use the Internet for?

Please tell me about a project that you completed that involved research on the Internet. Begin by providing me with some background details about the assignment, when and what it was exactly, and then tell me how you used the Internet to help you get the project done.

Holidays.question: I would like to know about the holidays celebrated in your country. What do the holidays commemorate? How do people celebrate them?

Holidays.question: Tell me about one of the biggest holidays in your country. What do people do and what kind of special food do people prepare on that day? Describe it in detail.
Tell me about a memorable holiday experience you had as a child. What exactly happened on that holiday? What made it so memorable? Provide as many details as possible.

Public transport.question: Discuss how people in your country get around every day. What forms of transportation do they use? Do they drive their own cars or use public transportation?
What forms of transportation are available where you live? What types of transportation do you usually use during the week? What types of transportation do you use on the weekend?

What kinds of difficulties or problems have you faced related to transportation? What exactly was the problem? How did it affect your day? What did you do to resolve the problem? Tell this story in detail from start to finish.

Weather.question: What is the weather like in your country? Are there distinct changes in the seasons? Describe what the weather is like in the summer. What is the weather like in the winter? Provide a detailed description of each of the four seasons.

Tell me about your favorite season and describe some of the activities that you do during this time of year. What types of activities do people in your country participate in during the summer? What types of things do these people do during the winter?
Do you think that the weather has changed over the past few years? What was it like in the past? How has it changed? Please describe the differences in detail.

Library.question: Describe the library you often go to. Where is it? What does it look like from the outside? What is the inside like? Provide as many details as possible.
What did the library you visited in your childhood look like? Are there any differences between it and the library you go to these days? Explain in detail.
Tell me about a memorable experience you had in a library. When was it, and what happened? Why was it so memorable?

Industry.question: Tell me about one of the major industries or companies in your country. What is special about the industry or the company? How has this industry or company achieved such a high level of success?
Describe one of the services or products that you have used in the industry you mentioned in the previous question. What was it? Tell me everything in detail.

Furniture.question: What is your favorite piece of furniture in the house? How do you use it? What makes is special? Give me as many details as possible.
The furniture in people's homes has changed over the years. Is the furniture in your current house different from the furniture you had when you were young? Provide as many details as possible.

Appliances.question: What types of appliances are commonly used in people's homes and where are they normally located in the homes?
What do you think is the most important appliance in your home? Why is it so important to you? How does it affect your daily life?

Think back to the last time you purchased or experienced a new electronic product. Discuss all the things that happened on that particular day, during, and after the event. Share your experiences and any memorable moments related to the electronic device.

Appointments.question: People set up appointments for various reasons. What sort of appointments do you usually make, social or otherwise? Who do you usually meet with? Where do you usually meet them? Tell me about it in detail.
Tell me about one of the appointments you had in your childhood. What was the appointment about, and how did it go? What happened? Tell me everything in detail.

Appointments.question: Tell me about the most memorable appointment you have ever had. What kind of appointment was it? Who did you meet? What did you do? Did anything unexpected or interesting occur? Why was it so memorable?

Banks.question: Describe the banks in your country. Where are they usually located, and what are they like? What hours are banks typically open there? Give as many details as possible.
What do people in your country usually do by visiting banks? Why do they visit banks? And what do you usually do when you visit banks? Please answer in as much detail as possible.
Have you ever experienced any problems at a bank? For instance, sometimes ATMs malfunction. What sort of problem did you face, and how did you deal with it?

Community Festivails.question: Can you tell me about special events in your community? What kind of festivals or events are held? Give me as many details as possible.
When do you go to your community festival? How often do you go and who do you go with? Please give me all the details?
Tell me about your most memorable experience related to the community festival. What happened? What made the experience memorable? Please describe it in as much detail as possible.

Geography.question: Tell me about the geography of your country. Are there a lot of lakes, rivers, beaches or mountains? Please describe it in as much detail as possible.

What types of outdoor activities do the people in your country do according to the geographical features? Are they interested in different types of things than people from other countries? Provide a detailed description of the things that people enjoy doing outdoors.

Have you ever been to a geographically unique area in your country? Where was it and what did the place look like? What did you see there? What did you do there? What was special about that place? Please tell me in as much detail as possible.

Outdoor activities.question: What types of outdoor activities do the people in your country do? Are they interested in different types of things than people from other countries? Provide a detailed description of the things that people enjoy doing outdoors.

What kinds of outdoor activities do you usually enjoy doing? How often do you engage in these activities, and what do you like most about them? Can you describe one or two of these activities in detail?
Describe the most memorable experience you have had outdoors. What is a beautiful place you have been to? Please provide as many details as possible.

Free time.question: Do you have much free time in Korea? When you need to take personal days from work, what do you have to do?

What did you do when you had some free time recently? Was it something you did over the weekend or during a vacation? Please tell me as many details as possible about what you did the last time you had free time.
Can you tell me about a memorable experience you had during your free time? What did you do, who were you with, and why does this experience stand out to you? Please describe everything in detail.

Fashion.question: Describe the clothes normally worn by people in your country. Do people wear different types of clothes for work and relaxing?
Where do you usually go shopping for clothes? What kinds of clothes do you like to buy? What are some important qualities you consider when shopping for attire?
Describe how fashion trends have changed over time in your country. What did people wear in the past? What types of clothes are popular now?

Phone Conversation.question: Where do you usually talk on the phone? Is there a particular place that you use the phone a lot? Please describe your habits in detail.
Think about a recent phone conversation you had. Who did you talk to, what was the conversation about, and how did it go? Please describe the entire conversation in as much detail as possible.
Can you describe a memorable experience you have had while talking on the phone? Who were you talking with? What happened? What was so special about it?

Hair Salons.question: Tell me about your favorite hair shop that you like to go to. What does your favorite hair shop look like? Why do you like that place?
When was the last time you got a haircut, and how did you find your hair designer? Tell me everything in detail
Tell me about a memorable experience you had when you went to get a haircut. What happened? Did anything go wrong? Please provide your answer in as much detail as possible.

Hotels.question: Tell me about the hotels in your country. What are those places like? Where are they normally located? Provide several details to describe hotels in your country.
Think about the last time you stayed at a hotel. When was it, where did you go, and what was the reason for your stay? How was the overall experience? Please describe everything in detail.

People often have memories of especially beautiful and interesting hotels. Tell me about a hotel that you remember for some reason. Where was it? What did it look like? Describe it for me in as much detail as possible.

Technology.question: Tell me about the technologies that are popular in your country. Which technology do people use the most there? What is it used for? Can you tell me why they like to use it?

Technology.question: Tell me about a piece of technology you use every day. What is it, and why is it useful? When and how do you use it? Please provide your answer in as much detail as possible.

Have you ever experienced a problem related to technology? For instance, sometimes a device does not work properly or is difficult to use. Describe your technological problem in detail. How did you handle it?

Health.question: Tell me about a healthy person you know. What does he or she look like? What kind of food does he or she like to eat? How did you meet him or her? Provide as many details as possible.
Many people put a lot of effort into staying fit. Is there anything special you do to stay healthy? Tell me what you do and explain why you do it.
Tell me about a health problem that you or a person close to you had. What were the symptoms? What did you or the other person do to get over it?

Recycling.question: Tell me about recycling in your country. What kind of items do people usually recycle? Please describe the recycling system in your country in detail.
How do you recycle at home? When and how often do you recycle? Describe each step of the process from beginning to end.
Tell me about a memorable experience you had while recycling. What happened? What made it so unique or memorable? Tell me about it in as much detail as possible.

Identification Card.question: What types of identification cards do people use in your country? In what situations do people need to use them?
When did you get your first ID card? How did you feel about it?

Neighborhood.question: Can you describe your neighborhood? What facilities and places are there?
What was your neighborhood like when you were a child? How was it different from now? How has your neighborhood changed over the past 10 years? What new developments have taken place?
Have you ever experienced an interesting or unexpected event in your neighborhood?

Career/Job.question: What are some popular jobs in your country? What kind of skills are required for them?
Have you ever had an interesting job experience? What happened?
How is the job market changing in your country? How has the job market in your country changed in recent years? Are new types of jobs becoming popular?

Global Warming.question: How is global warming currently affecting the environment in Your country? Can you provide specific examples of its impacts on nature or society?
How do you personally contribute to reducing global warming in your daily life? What steps do you take to make a difference?
What impact does global warming have on people's daily lives, particularly in terms of lifestyle or health?

Police.question: Tell me about the police officers in your country. What are their responsibilities, what do they wear, and what do they do?
Did you ever have an interesting or funny experience with the police when you were younger?
Have you ever had any memorable experience with the police? What was it, and what happened? Please provide your answer in as much detail as possible.

City.question: Describe big cities in your country. Where are they located? What are they like, and what do people usually do there? Talk about their features in detail.
What are the differences between the past and now when it comes to cities in your country?
Have you ever had a memorable experience in a city? What happened? What was it about? Please tell me everything from beginning to end, in as much detail as possible.

Countryside.question: What is the countryside like in your country? How is it different from the city?
Did you ever live in or visit the countryside when you were a child? What do you remember about it?
Have you ever visited or lived in the countryside? What was your experience like? Have you ever had any memorable experience?
